Uses of Class
opennlp.ccg.alignment.Alignment

Packages that use Alignment
opennlp.ccg.alignment This package provides classes for modeling alignments between two phrases. 
opennlp.ccg.disjunctivizer Package for the disjunctivizer, which creates a disjunctive LF XML structure based on an LFGraphDifference. 
 

Uses of Alignment in opennlp.ccg.alignment
 

Methods in opennlp.ccg.alignment that return Alignment
static Alignment Alignment.fromMap(Phrase a, Phrase b, Map<Integer,Set<Integer>> map)
          Creates a new alignment based on the specified phrases and map view of their mappings.
 Alignment Alignment.reverse()
          Creates an alignment based on this one except that the phrases have switched positions and all of the mappings are reversed.

Uses of Alignment in opennlp.ccg.disjunctivizer
 

Methods in opennlp.ccg.disjunctivizer that return Alignment
 Alignment LFGraphDifference.getAlignment()
          Gets the alignment used to determine the edits between the two graphs.
 

Constructors in opennlp.ccg.disjunctivizer with parameters of type Alignment
LFGraphDifference(LFGraph a, LFGraph b, Alignment alignment)
          Creates a new graph difference between a and b, as determined by the specified alignment.
